content:
Dear @RalfJ and @oli

It would appear that the Miri cron job build failed. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot

Weird, I can't reproduce these failures. I ran ./miri build && ./miri test after updating my Miri clone and everything passed. Then I tried MIRIFLAGS="-O -Zmir-opt-level=4" ./miri test and it still passed. I then tried ./rustup-toolchain HEAD and everything still passed. What am I missing? (I'm on macOS, which is one of the CI builders that failed.)

Sorry, I think I've already fixed it yesterday: miri#1790
I should have left a comment here...
